BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: Uses particular and unhealthy methods by use of mining resources to increase productivity.
The Arena trains soldiers by making them practice the art of fighting against slaves.
Harsh environments can create hard and useful people.
Diminishes trade profit in targeted city
+50% to trade and one extra trade route
Cause target to have a permanent diplomatic reaction.
All water improvements around the city's fat cross are destroyed
Reduction in Beakers' percentage in the targeted city.
Reduction in Health and Heal Rate inside the targeted city
Wealth reduction inside the targeted city.
-50% military production and -3 exp inside the targeted city
Addicts and removes 1 population from the targeted city and adds it as a free specialist in one of your cities
Brings in a free addicted specialist (spy or merchant)
stops specialists from being assigned inside the targeted city
Decreases production inside the targeted city.
Cultural Growth stimulated by influencing others
Causes Targeted Leader to have the 'Poisoned' trait temporarily.
Contrary to the rule on Arrakis, House Richese decided to specialize the Suspensors instead of Thopters.
The Refinement Complex is an assembly plant that also has the means to refine several different materials to increase their value - a Richesian speciality.

A "monument" to the production efficiency of the Richesians - it is a production room that works side by side with other production facilities and will duplicate part by part any mechanic unit that was queued in the city. It gathers the best tech workers and they are paid handsomely (many, though, perish prematurely by work stress and exhaustion).
All hammer improvements around the city's fat cross are destroyed
